title: Lesson 18
paragraph: This lesson explores environment and sustainability, including ecological systems, conservation, and human impact.

words.meaning: relating to the relationships between organisms and their environment
words.example: Ecological studies help us understand biodiversity.
Biotic factors include plants, animals, and microbes.

words.meaning: a person who advocates for protecting the environment
words.example: The conservationist campaigned to save the wetlands.
